```{r}
# Load packages
library(bayesrules)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
# Import data
data(bechdel, package = "bayesrules")

# Take a sample of 20 movies
set.seed(84735)
bechdel_20 <- bechdel |> 
  sample_n(20)

bechdel_20 |>
  head(3)
```

```{r}
bechdel_20 |>
  tabyl(binary) |>
  adorn_totals("row")
```

```{r}
# Morteza
bechdel |> 
  filter(year == 1991) |> 
  tabyl(binary) |> 
  adorn_totals("row")
```

```{r}
# Nadide 
bechdel %>% 
  filter(year == 2000) %>% 
  tabyl(binary) %>% 
  adorn_totals("row")
```

```{r}
# Ursula 
bechdel %>% 
  filter(year == 2013) %>% 
  tabyl(binary) %>% 
  adorn_totals("row")
```
